feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 01:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:03 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:03 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:03 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
